name: Nusa Talent
description: Nusa Talent With experienced teachers and commitment to excellence, Nusa has become the first choice in providing a variety of development events professional. Starting from in-depth seminars, interactive workshops, to training, we dedicated to providing quality experiences to enrich knowledge and skills You.
business_objectives: Boost Hiring Manager Confidence and Productivity
Headline: Career. Candidate. Connected.
ShortDescription: Nusa Talent provides end-to-end staffing and crowd talent services to help clients recruit.

Highlights.name: Find your strengths and interests
Highlights.description: Take NusaTalent Aptitude Test to find a careers that suits your strengths and interests.

Highlights.name: Upgrade your skill and knowledge
Highlights.description: Join NusaTalks on topics that match your interests. It is useful to upgrade your skills as a preparation for your career.

Highlights.name: Find your dream job and start your career!
Highlights.description: Download NusaTalent on Google Play Store or App Store and immediately send an application with one click!

enhanced_description: Nusa Talent provides end-to-end staffing and crowd talent services to help clients recruit, leveraging a vast network of over 1.1 million talents across 34 provinces and partnerships with 200+ universities. Beyond traditional recruitment, it offers talent development resources, including aptitude tests to identify strengths and interests, and interactive workshops (NusaTalks) to upgrade skills for career preparation. The platform aims to connect talent with dream job opportunities and optimize the hiring process to boost hiring manager confidence and productivity.
key_use_cases: Skill development and career preparation through workshops (NusaTalks)
Job application and placement for candidates
Boosting hiring manager confidence and productivity
competitive_advantages: Extensive talent pool with over 1,100,000+ talents in 34 provinces
Strong academic network with 200+ university partners
Large client base with over 1,000+ clients
Provides integrated talent assessment (Aptitude Test) and skill development (NusaTalks) for candidates
Offers end-to-end staffing and crowd talent services
roi_benefits: Boosts Hiring Manager Confidence and Productivity
Provides access to a large, diverse talent pool
Enhances candidate quality through skill development and assessment
scalability_features: Supports over 1,100,000+ talents, indicating a large capacity for talent management
Designed to serve Small, Large, and Global Enterprises
